title: IMF team to arrive in SL on June 20
body_lines: An IMF team will arrive in Sri Lanka on June 20, to begin discussions on the staff level agreement, political sources told Daily Mirror a short while ago.
During their visit the team will hold discussions with the President and Prime Minister who is also the finance minister.
Prime Minister Wickremesinghe will look to finalize the staff level agreement during the visit, sources said. (Jamila Husain)
